Turn any text or link into a QR code

Paste a URL, a note, Wi-Fi credentials, or anything else. Generate a high quality QR code and download it as a PNG.

Your QR is generated locally in your browser.

Logo (optional)

A small square logo works best. It will be centered on top of your QR.

Logo size20%
Opacity100%

Tip: Keeping the logo under ~22% of the QR helps it stay easy to scan.
